## Technical Details

### API Configuration
- **API Provider:** OpenRouter
- **Model:** google/gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview
- **Aspect Ratio:** 1:1 (Square)
- **Output Format:** PNG
- **Color Space:** RGB

### Generation Parameters
- **Prompt Source:** POST_09_DESIGN_SPECS.md (AI Image Generation Prompts section)
- **Modalities:** ["text", "image"]
- **Timeout:** 120 seconds per image
- **Retry Logic:** Automatic with exponential backoff

### Image Specifications
- **Target Dimensions:** 1080x1080px (Instagram square)
- **Actual Dimensions:** 1024x1024px (Model default, acceptable for Instagram)
- **File Format:** PNG
- **Quality:** High (AI-generated, state-of-the-art quality)

## Slide Content Breakdown

### Slide 1: 48 Hours Warning (Cover)
- **Purpose:** Create urgency and anchor the carousel
- **Key Elements:**
  - Giant countdown clock showing "48:00:00"
  - Bold "48 HOURS!" headline with red outline
  - "Your Complete KK6 Guide" subheadline
  - KannaKlaus character pointing to clock
  - "Swipe for Everything You Need to Know ‚Üí" CTA
  - "Save This Guide" badge
- **Design:** Radial gradient (gold center to forest green edges), sparkles, urgent energy

### Slide 2: Location & Parking
- **Purpose:** Provide practical venue information
- **Key Elements:**
  - Simplified illustrated map of Ginza Restaurant location
  - Address: 8654 E Topaz Dr, Gold Canyon, AZ 85118
  - Parking information (on-site lot available)
  - Arrival time window (2-6pm)
  - Pro tip: "GPS it now so you're not guessing Saturday"
- **Design:** Clean white background, forest green header, gold location pin

### Slide 3: What to Bring
- **Purpose:** Set clear expectations for attendees
- **Key Elements:**
  - Checklist format with 3 items:
    1. 1 New, Unwrapped Toy (= 1 entry to giveaway)
    2. Your Friends (the more, the merrier)
    3. Your Vibe (leave stress at home)
  - Bottom message: "That's it. Simple. Show up ready to celebrate and give back"
  - Giant gift icon background (subtle)
  - KannaKlaus thumbs up
- **Design:** Light green background, dark green header, white checklist boxes

### Slide 4: What to Expect
- **Purpose:** Preview event activities and vendors
- **Key Elements:**
  - 4-quadrant grid layout:
    - **Games:** Crane Game, Bong Pong, Pinata w/ KannaKlaus
    - **Vendors:** 10 Booths, Local Brands, Giveaways All Day
    - **Food:** Full Ginza Menu, Amazing Asian Cuisine
    - **Giveaways:** Gift Bags, Multiple Winners
- **Design:** White background, red header, gold dividing lines between quadrants

### Slide 5: The Impact
- **Purpose:** Emotional storytelling about charity mission
- **Key Elements:**
  - Sojourner Center logo (prominent, respectful)
  - Impact statement about domestic violence survivors
  - Goal: $7,000+ in toys
  - Historical context: "6th year running ‚Ä¢ $20,000+ donated since 2020"
  - Quote: "This is bigger than us. This is all of us."
  - Hands holding heart icon (background)
- **Design:** Light green to white gradient, heart pattern watermark, warm aesthetic

### Slide 6: Final Checklist
- **Purpose:** Drive action and conversions
- **Key Elements:**
  - Clipboard graphic with 5 action items:
    1. RSVP at kannakickback.com (if you haven't)
    2. Invite your friends (tag them)
    3. Pick up a toy to donate (Target, Walmart, Dollar Store)
    4. Mark Dec 6 on calendar (2-6pm)
    5. Screenshot this guide (share to story)
  - Bottom: "See you in 48 hours üíö"
  - KannaKlaus holding clipboard
  - Website: kannakickback.com
  - "SAVE THIS GUIDE" top banner
- **Design:** Forest green background, white clipboard, gold sparkles, actionable
